name: Fingerguns
description:
Blast away the competition with only your fingertips!

Engage friends and foes into the fingerguns arena, where the fastest finger wins!

Download on Windows and create a room for you friends to join, then get to blasting!

Created for the 7DFPS Game Jam

How to play
  1. Download and unzip the folder
  2. Run 7DFPS.exe
  3. Create a room using a memorable code
  4. Have friends join your room using the same code
  5. Use the controls below to battle!
Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump / Wall Jump

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Zoom

Shift - Sprint

Escape - Pause / Options
